mapper.insert:

( #{element.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{element.chargeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{element.receivableAmountReceived,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{element.liquidatedDamagesNeed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{element.liquidatedDamagesReceived,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{element.liquidatedDamagesTax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{element.liquidatedDamagesNotTax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{element.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{element.createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{element.totalReceived,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{element.onlyPrincipal,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{element.transactionMode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{element.accountBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.customerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{element.totalOwe,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{element.liquidatedDamagesRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{element.companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{element.houseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{element.chargeItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{element.ownershipPeriodBegin,jdbcType=DATE}, #{element.ownershipPeriodEnd,jdbcType=DATE} )
